Speaking during a visit to Scotland shortly after Andy Coulson 's announcement, the Labour leader said the resignation raised questions about David Cameron 's judgment. "He's now done the right thing," Ed Miliband said. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment about hanging on to him as long as he did. Labour, which had been expecting Andy Coulson to resign for weeks, had long planned to turn his resignation into an issue about David Cameron 's judgment.
